channel.title: How do i add npc's so they stay?
channel.description: Hey guys! How do i add a npc so it stay there for evah???? :confused: ~ :(~Nicke~~

item.title: How do i add npc's so they stay?

item.title: How do i add npc's so they stay?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

Your Master:

Nicke now go on that called ‘‘NPC’’ in your server files, then go to that Npc you maked there is walkY walkX then put the coords where it stays. Then it wont move.

npc.java doesnt do nothing.
npc.cfg just changes the combat level and hitpoints the monster has.
if you change the 0 0 0 0 in autospawn to numbers then it will work but he said"
How do i add a npc so it stay there for evah" and not how do i make a npc walk.

also please learn to type. typing stupid errors will make ppl not post as much…

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add npc's so they stay?

item.title: How do i add npc's so they stay?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Your Master:

Nicke now go on that called ‘‘NPC’’ in your server files, then go to that Npc you maked there is walkY walkX then put the coords where it stays. Then it wont move.

Can you stop posting random posts that don’t make sense? >.<

On Topic: I think what you mean is that you just want the NPC to be configured onto the server. Just read XxLukexX’s post.

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:2, topic:262704”]add the npc to your autospawn.cfg file…

spawn = NPC ID	####	####	0	0	0	0	0	1	description

bascially add that to your autospawn.cfg file

change the npc id to your npc id…
First #### = X Coordinate
Second #### = Y Coordinate
description = what its called.

save and done…[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add npc's so they stay?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

add the npc to your autospawn.cfg file…

spawn = NPC ID	####	####	0	0	0	0	0	1	description

bascially add that to your autospawn.cfg file

change the npc id to your npc id…

= to where you want it to be.

description = what its called.

save and done…
